Package pfriendly

Class Up3

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PImage
      • processing.core.PGraphics
        • processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
          • pfriendly.UpOgl
            • pfriendly.Up3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, IUp, IUp3, IUpOgl, processing.core.PConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Yup3, Zup3
    public abstract class Up3
extends UpOgl
implements IUpOgl, IUp3
    An abstract parent class for 3D renderers.

    • Nested Class Summary
